page.title: 02LEISURE
page.content: {MURSLEY}HAS QUITE A FEW CLUBS WHICH ACTUALLY MEET IN THE VILLAGE:{BROWNIES (NINETEEN MEMBERS) ,{GUIDES}(TWELVE) ,{SUNDAY SCHOOL}(TWENTY SEVEN), {FOOTBALL CLUBS}(BOY'S ELEVEN),(MEN'S FOURTEEN),{LADIES CRICKET}(EIGHTEEN), {W.I.}(FORTY ONE) AND THE{EVERGREEN'S (TWENTY THREE).THERE IS NOT A SCOUT OR CUB PACK IN THE VILLAGE AND CUBS AND SCOUTS HAVE TO GO TO GREAT HORWOOD WHICH IS ABOUT FOUR MILES AWAY. {DRAYTON PARSLOW}HAS THE FOLLOWING CLUBS:{SPORTS,W.I.,CRICKET,SUNDAY {SCHOOL}AND{CONSERVATIVE ASSOCIATION.
